intro: Cyrtandra glandulosa, commonly known as the Hawaiian hibiscus, is a flowering plant native to the Hawaiian Islands. Cyrtandra glandulosa plays an important role in the native flora of Hawaii and is adapted to the island's unique ecological conditions.
